title: Frog and Stanley Are Friends
description: Stanley is a carefree frog who lives on the nicer side of the bog with his father and mother. His mother works hard to ensure that her boys are taken care of at the end of their days. However she is particular about their personal hygiene. After knowing for years Stanleyâ€™s father, Todd gives Stanley a few hints and tips about washing his hands and staying cleanly so Gretchen his mother has no further demands. In this brief story you learn about the importance of washing your hands and also general daily hygiene. There are also some real life tips that are directed towards kids as tips to ensure they are washing their hands correctly. This fun short story surely gets to the point of the importance of hand washing while also promoting family communication at a young age.
author: S.J. Walter
